sentences.sContent: Maurice asked me whether I needed any help.
sentences.sCn: 莫里斯问我是否需要帮助。

sentences.sContent: There were times when I wondered whether or not we would get there.
sentences.sCn: 有时候我也想知道我们能不能做得到。

sentences.sContent: I didn’t know whether to believe him or not.
sentences.sCn: 我不知道该不该相信他。

sentences.sContent: The question arose as to whether this behaviour was unlawful.
sentences.sCn: 问题出现了: 这种行为是否不合法？

remMethod.val: 明天天气(weather)是否(whether)会晴朗呢？

trans.tranOther: used when talking about a choice you have to make or about something that is not certain
